longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency and temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days:
 - for nationals of Brunei Darussalam; (SEE NOTE 58737)
     NOTE 58737: Not applicable to holders of Emergency or
    Temporary passports.
Minors:
- Passengers under 18 years of age 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry
